fields.fieldTitle: The Opportunity Switch Headline / Title of your Masterclass

fieldHint.hint1: What is the title / headline for your Masterclass? (Page 69-70 "Expert Secrets")

fieldHint.hint2: To use the "Opportunity Switch Headline / Title Script"  Click Here

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: How to Create a 7-Figure Funnel in Less Than 30 Minutes Without Having to Hire, or Be Held Hostage by, a Tech Guy, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the big HOW TO they want to know how to do in this area?

fieldHint.hint1: "My target audience really wants to know how to ________." (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: create a 7-figure funnel; make a quick 10K this weekend by flipping houses on eBay; naturally destroy your kid's ADHD; reconnect with your wife; lose weight without exercising; enjoy a youthful appearance, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What is the DATE of your live Masterclass?
